column4: Anyone to help? I only need to "autostart" a program (run as service) and I have no clue... Anyone?
as a service, when the computer starts up? Or when a user's desktop session starts?
there should be a startup script that gdm will invoke, where you can put your vncserver.
unfortunately, i'm not actually running Ubuntu right this minute; rather, KDE on debian, so I don't think I can investigate :(
